channel.title: Comments on: Kuri Starts Shipping!
channel.description: Meet Kuri, the adorable home robot.

item.title: By: Chris Bradshaw
item.dc:creator: Chris Bradshaw
item.description: Very well written. This blog is very informative and interesting. Keep sharing your knowledge with us.
item.content:encoded: Very well written. This blog is very informative and interesting. Keep sharing your knowledge with us.

item.title: By: Benjamin
item.dc:creator: Benjamin
item.description: For future improvements, can you attach a Roomba like feature to the bottom so that it cleans the house as it roams to make it MORE useful.
item.content:encoded: For future improvements, can you attach a Roomba like feature to the bottom so that it cleans the house as it roams to make it MORE useful.

item.title: By: Jennifer
item.dc:creator: Jennifer
item.description: Hi Ira - There is no API planned for Kuri at this time. Please email our customer care team at support@heykuri.com for additional questions. Thanks!
item.content:encoded: Hi Ira – There is no API planned for Kuri at this time. Please email our customer care team at support@heykuri.com for additional questions. Thanks!

item.title: By: IRA FUCHS
item.dc:creator: IRA FUCHS
item.description: Do you plan on adding any customizability? Will there be any kind of API for the more technically inclined? Or is it what you see is what you get? I'm sure you have thought of many use cases, but there will be many that you haven't accounted for and it would be great if the community could begin to contribute to the capabilities of Kuri.
item.content:encoded: Do you plan on adding any customizability? Will there be any kind of API for the more technically inclined? Or is it what you see is what you get? I’m sure you have thought of many use cases, but there will be many that you haven’t accounted for and it would be great if the community could begin to contribute to the capabilities of Kuri.

item.title: By: Jennifer
item.dc:creator: Jennifer
item.description: Hi Ramya - Please contact our customer support team directly at support@heykuri.com regarding a specific order. Thanks!
item.content:encoded: Hi Ramya – Please contact our customer support team directly at support@heykuri.com regarding a specific order. Thanks!

item.title: By: Lisa
item.dc:creator: Lisa
item.description: Congratulations! I'm more than a little jealous of all the lucky people in the USA who are able to pre-order. I'm keeping all my fingers crossed for international (UK) shipping soon!
item.content:encoded: Congratulations! I’m more than a little jealous of all the lucky people in the USA who are able to pre-order. I’m keeping all my fingers crossed for international (UK) shipping soon!

item.title: By: Jennifer
item.dc:creator: Jennifer
item.description: Hi Danny - Thanks for reaching out to us! At this time, Kuri isn't available for international shipping. We're focusing on successfully delivering Kuri robots across the USA before we start shipping abroad. If you haven't already, be sure to subscribe to our email newsletter for updates on future international shipping.
item.content:encoded: Hi Danny – Thanks for reaching out to us! At this time, Kuri isn’t available for international shipping. We’re focusing on successfully delivering Kuri robots across the USA before we start shipping abroad. If you haven’t already, be sure to subscribe to our email newsletter for updates on future international shipping.

item.title: By: Danny Ratcliffe
item.dc:creator: Danny Ratcliffe
item.description: Can someone let me know how I could get one in the UK? Thank you Dan
item.content:encoded:
Can someone let me know how I could get one in the UK?
Thank you
Dan

item.title: By: Jennifer
item.dc:creator: Jennifer
item.description: Hi Vera - Your robot should arrive this spring (no exact date just yet). We'll email you to confirm your shipping address when your Kuri is ready to roll out. If you have any questions in the meantime, you can reach our customer care team at support@heykuri.com. Thanks, and happy holidays!
item.content:encoded: Hi Vera – Your robot should arrive this spring (no exact date just yet). We’ll email you to confirm your shipping address when your Kuri is ready to roll out. If you have any questions in the meantime, you can reach our customer care team at support@heykuri.com. Thanks, and happy holidays!
